vgu.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • vgu.control.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControl

    public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControl
    This empty control template can be best implemented by evaluating all JUnit-TestCases.

      • getFrequency

        public double getFrequency()
        Manage the frequency based on certain conditions ( from the requirements) and return the value of the frequency. The standard frequency is 50Hz. By each 10% the power supply is higher than the demand power, the frequency is decreased by 1Hz. And by each 10% the power supply is lower than the demand power, the frequency is increased by 1Hz.
        Specified by:
        getFrequency in interface IControl

      • getCost

        public double getCost()
        Return the cost of the generators' providing power.
        Specified by:
        getCost in interface IControl

        public void nextIteration()
        Manage the change of the power supply of the generator based on the difference between the power supply and the demand power of the current iteration.
